title: Calomnion
text:
Calomnion is a genus of <a href="moss">moss</a>es in the family <a href="Rhizogoniaceae">Rhizogoniaceae</a>. They have been reported from <a href="Australia">Australia</a>, <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>, <a href="Polynesia">Polynesia</a>, <a href="Melanesia">Melanesia</a>, <a href="New%20Guinea">New Guinea</a>, and eastern <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a>.
Classification.
The genus was originally placed within its own family, the Calomniaceae, with the genus "Nadeaudia". "Nadeudia" contained one species, "Nadeaudia schistostegiella", which is now considered a synonym for "<a href="Calomnion%20schistostegiellum">Calomnion schistostegiellum</a>".
